text: Alan David Halsall (born 11 August 1982 in Walkden, Worsley, Greater Manchester) is an English actor. He is best known for playing Tyrone Dobbs in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street, a role which he has played since 1998. He has a daughter with his ex-wife Lucy-Jo Hudson. ==Other websites== * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:People from Salford
title: Alan Halsall
